name: Descent
description:
Use the GOG installer to install the D1X Rebirth version of Descent.

- High resolution textures and sound from:
https://www.dxx-rebirth.com/download/dxx/res/d1xr-hires.dxa
https://www.dxx-rebirth.com/download/dxx/res/d1xr-sc55-music.dxa

files.data: N/A:Select the GOG installer for Descent

content:
files:
- data: N/A:Select the GOG installer for Descent
- engine: https://lutris.net/files/games/dxxrebirth/d1x-rebirth-0.58.1-x86_64.tar.gz
- texture: https://www.dxx-rebirth.com/download/dxx/res/d1xr-hires.dxa
- sound: https://www.dxx-rebirth.com/download/dxx/res/d1xr-sc55-music.dxa
game:
  args: -hogdir .
  exe: d1x-rebirth
installer:
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$data"
    file: innoextract
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: engine
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/app
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $texture
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $sound
require-binaries: innoextract
